# Using Templates

Templates are pre-built platform configurations that accelerate project setup.

## What Are Templates?

Templates provide:
- Complete project scaffolding
- Pre-configured dependencies
- Best practices built-in
- Ready-to-run code

## Built-in Templates

GPP ships with templates for every platform variant:

### Web Templates

| Template | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| webapp | Generic Next.js application |
| saas-dashboard | SaaS with auth and billing |
| admin-dashboard | Admin panel with data management |
| marketing | Marketing site with blog |
| landing | Simple landing page |
| devtool-site | Documentation site |
| headless-strapi | Next.js frontend for Strapi |
| headless-wp-cms | Next.js frontend for WordPress |
| headless-wp-ecommerce | Next.js + WooCommerce |

### API Templates

| Template | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| express | Node.js Express with TypeScript |

### Python Templates

| Template | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| fastapi | Python FastAPI with OpenAPI |
| base | Base Python project |
| conda-trading | Conda environment for trading |

### Mobile Templates

| Template | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| expo | React Native with Expo Router |
| flutter-standalone | Flutter standalone app |
| flutter-api-client | Flutter with API integration |

### CMS Templates

| Template | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| strapi-only | Strapi 5 CMS (production) |
| strapi-dev | Strapi 5 CMS (development) |
| wp-content | WordPress with Docker |
| cms-only | Basic CMS setup |

### Desktop Templates

| Template | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| electron | Electron desktop app |

### Worker Templates

| Template | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| celery-python | Python Celery workers |

## Using Templates

### Via gpp add

The simplest way to use templates:

```bash
gpp add web saas-dashboard
```

### Via gpp template install

For templates from the registry:

```bash
gpp template install @gpp/analytics-dashboard
```

### From Git

```bash
gpp template install github:username/my-template
```

## Template Variables

Some templates support variables for customization:

```bash
gpp add web saas-dashboard --var projectName="My SaaS"
```

Or answer prompts during installation.

## Listing Available Templates

```bash
gpp template list
```

## Getting Template Info

```bash
gpp template info web/saas-dashboard
```
